a.title: Facilities Booking
a.style: padding-top: 3px; display: block; width: 84px; height: 81px; font-size: 13.3333px; text-align: center;

span.style: text-align: center; background-color: rgb(247, 150, 70); font-family: "MS Sans Serif"; color: rgb(149, 55, 52);

p.span:
All New Students for the 2020-2021 School Year must complete the Online Pre-Registration prior to submitting required documents at a Scheduled In-Person Appointment.
For more information, please select the appropriate box below:

div.div: Our Mission The mission of the West Deptford Public Schools, valuing our tradition of excellence, is to develop well rounded, motivated, 21st century thinkers. As a result, learners will transition from competent students to productive and responsible citizens.
